title: Hell before loading screen
body:
So before ya guys start telling me that my laptop don't meet the graphic requirement, I been playing this game with this laptop for a long long timeeee :3 above 50 fps and never crash. no problemo except when im lagging lel.
But for some reason, starting today, after champion selection screen, the game will freeze at champion loading screen and I will crash soon after with bugsplat or nothing.
Never happen before and what I noticed, it started happen after that new store and match history update. Just wondering if those have something to do with this.
I ain't got any corrupt file or anything,played like normal last night. Didn't use the laptop again until a while ago when I wanna game(rarely play other game so I didn't use the laptop much until I wanna league) and then this happen.

W T F GG EZ T-Shirt Here>>: https://goo.gl/s19MeO

replies.body:
Bugsplats are usually a direct result of driver or hardware issues. League could have a hard time interacting with your graphics driver or memory. A good place to start in finding the exact cause is to check out the steps in our [Bugsplat & Crashing guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) since the steps inside it are common solutions.

If your issues persist after working through those steps, let me know.
